purpose.para: Returns the iterator pointing to the first element of the MetaObjectSequence.

section.title: Examples
section.programlisting: typedef ::std::pair< bool, double> P; BOOST_MPL_ASSERT(( iterator_equal< begin< BOOST_MIRRORED_CLASS(P)::attributes >::type, point_to< BOOST_MIRRORED_CLASS(P)::attributes, mpl::int_<0> >::type > )); BOOST_MPL_ASSERT(( iterator_not_equal< begin< BOOST_MIRRORED_CLASS(P)::all_attributes >::type, point_to< BOOST_MIRRORED_CLASS(P)::all_attributes, mpl::int_<1> >::type > ));
